table.name: vtiger_pincodes
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_pincodes` ( `pincodesid` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `pincode` INT(10) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`pincodesid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

table.name: vtiger_pincodescf
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_pincodescf` ( `pincodesid` int(11) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`pincodesid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
